  • Method Details

    • addBlock

      public int addBlock​(float tx, float ty, float tz, int cx, int cy, int cz, int offset, short id, boolean[] sides, float crackAmount)
      Creates cube data and puts it into buffers for one mesh.
      Parameters:
      tx - x coordinate of the cube to create.
      ty - y coordinate of the cube to create.
      tz - z coordinate of the cube to create.
      offset - number of indices
      id - the block id of the cube to add to the mesh.
      sides - array containing the values for the cubes order: left, right, top, bottom, before, behind
      Returns:
      number of vertices added

    • addFlower

      public int addFlower​(float tx, float ty, float tz, int offset, short type)
      Creates flower mesh data and puts it into buffers for one mesh.
      Parameters:
      tx - x coordinate of the mesh to create.
      ty - y coordinate of the mesh to create.
      tz - z coordinate of the mesh to create.
      offset - number of the indices.
      type - the block id to add to the mesh.
      Returns:
      number of vertices added.

    • addFirstDiagonalFront

      private int addFirstDiagonalFront​(float tx, float ty, float tz, int offset, short type)
      Builds the first diagonal mesh for the flower.
      Parameters:
      tx - x coordinate of the mesh to create.
      ty - y coordinate of the mesh to create.
      tz - z coordinate of the mesh to create.
      offset - offset value for the triangles of the mesh.
      type - the block id to add to the mesh.
      Returns:
      number of vertices added.

    • addFirstDiagonalBack

      private int addFirstDiagonalBack​(float tx, float ty, float tz, int offset, short type)
      Builds the first diagonal mesh for the flower facing the other way to cancel out backface-culling
      Parameters:
      tx - x coordinate of the mesh to create.
      ty - y coordinate of the mesh to create.
      tz - z coordinate of the mesh to create.
      offset - offset value for the triangles of the mesh
      type - the block id to add to the mesh.
      Returns:
      number of vertices added

      ty - y coordinate of the mesh to create.
      tz - z coordinate of the mesh to create.
      offset - offset value for the triangles of the mesh.

    • addTextureCoordinates

      public void addTextureCoordinates​(short blockID, int textureIndex, boolean mirror)
      Adds the right texture from the texture atlas to the block

      created by Tobias Mueller

      Parameters:
      blockID - the id of the block
      textureIndex - indicates which side of the cube is needed. (0 == front, 1 == right, 2 == back, 3 == left, 4* == top, 5 == bottom)

    • calculateAO

    • checkIfCubeIsVisible

      private boolean checkIfCubeIsVisible​(int x, int y, int z, boolean[] sides)
      If a cube has "air" on one of the sides, it is visible ATTENTION: changes the values of parameter sides! TODO: also check other chunks for border cubes
      Parameters:
      sides - array containing the values for the cubes order: left, right, top, bottom, before, behind. Gets changed in this method!
